snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission filed charges against three firms that trade shares of privately held technology companies: Felix Investments, EB Financial and SharesPost.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission filed charges against three firms that trade shares of privately held technology companies: Felix Investments, EB Financial and SharesPost.

headline.main: Charges Filed Against Brokerage Firms That Trade Private Shares
headline.print_headline: U.S. Accuses 3 Firms Of Trading Improperly
